Description: Taiba Holding (known as: Taiba) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Taiba operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Diversified Real Estate Activities. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Taiba is based in Medina, Saudi Arabia and was established in September 1988.
